column6: Let me check the Marvel Wiki. Hang on... OK...Deadpool is a guy with guns and swords... Thanos is an Eternal with strength, endurance, agility, and nearly invulnerable skin, who can shoot cosmic energy from his eyes and hands. Sounds like a fair fight!
column8: | artist:Elmo Bondoc | penciller (cover):Tradd Moore | writer:Tim Seeley
